formula.name: Buffalo
formula.reference: Xrn = abs((Xr2 - Xi2 * 3) * Xr) + Cr; Xin = abs((Xr2 * 3 - Xi2) * Xi) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = diffabs(Xr * (Xr * Xr - 3 * Xi * Xi), xr * (3 * Xr * Xr + xr * xr) + 3 * Xr * (xr * xr - 2 * Xi * xi - xi * xi) - 3 * xr * (Xi * Xi + 2 * Xi * xi + xi * xi)) + cr; xin = diffabs(Xi * (3 * Xr * Xr - Xi * Xi), 3 * Xi * (2 * Xr * xr + xr * xr - xi * xi) + 3 * xi * (Xr * Xr + 2 * Xr * xr + xr * xr) - xi * (3 * Xi * Xi + xi * xi)) + ci;
